choices: in the water near a island with no features. (just a rock in water)
on a rock in a field of flowers hard.
in a meadow of anemes safely.
in something that smell and is unpleasant.
1.content: "Wake up its time to start" said your elder in a calm tone trying not to abruptly wake you. Then a second later his partner, a more harsh woman, yells "MOVE NOW OR I`LL CHOP YOU HEAD OFF!" You jump out of your bed and nearly out of your skin. you start to head to the observatory.They follow behind you closely and proud of you as their student.You known them both for along time but they never acted like this. But today was not a normal day. Today is the day you get my power of godly writing instead of a training god glove. Today is the day you get your book of world.(The books of world are the way in and out of that world. The books are blank and only a few can write in it. What is written becomes part of the world but it can not create life or restore it. It can`t be lost or ruined once given and only way to get rid of it is to burn it)As you made your way, both your teachers where arguing whether or not you would be selfless or self-center, taking or giving, kind or brutal, rude or polite, and so on. They went until good or evil then silence. When you reach the observatory the doors burst open showing a simple pool with mist over it. There stood a pillar with a book. Both elders gave the book of world to you and with a pen. you first filled the pen with the black liquid from the pool as the ritual says to.you open your book and the first page was a map of a world and on the second had a picture of a person falling with a book with him. The elder woman said "this is my favorite part." Not paying attention you touch the picture and started to fall. The sky around you rushing. you was heading towards the ground.You hear a voice next to you then an other you relies it the book and the voice were that of your teachers. One of them said "I hope he hits hard on the head" and the others apposes the idea of that and said" he might land in water or haystack or a meadow of anemones.""Yah! on a big sharp rock in a patch of flowers.You land ....
1.title: Enter The world

choices: write for them to praise you
11.content: People start to crowd around the spectacle of the one who fell from the sky.The crowd starts to whisper that it was a hoax as you stand up and walk towards your book that fell a few feet a way.The sky was getting dark and the clouds slowly drift towards you. Slowly more people drifted like the clouds and the sun was gone by the time the village arrived trying to help you from your nasty fall.You pick up your book and ...
11.title: in a village.

113.content: you write that they will praise you for the rest of there lives.they start sacrificing there young maidens. you quickly say stop and they follow and they bow for your forgiveness. you decided to punish them by plaques. A green mist rises from the fields and coves the village and sudden rain fill the streets with water that has green fire on it. It lasted a week the villagers were angry and try to kill you. But little do they know they can`t.you ...
113.title: write for them to praise you

info.brief_description: play god and write beings into the world of our own design.
info.description:
Wecome to the world.
Unknown to everyone you are there god.
The main rule play God
The second rule your powers are threw writing.
Here an example:
Eric has one cow you want him to have two cows so you`ll write eric has two cows.
For revoming objects you would write there is no (fill in the blank) here or somthing
Understand they don`t know your god. you can make yourself know or not.
Can be evil or nice.
Keep it simple and there are gods above you in rank.
You have the hands of a god on key board.
Over the top control.
Understand a world of great power.

You will not die for it is not writen!
